content: Robert Jaffe: Welcome, everyone, and thank you for joining us today to discuss NantHealth's 2022 First Quarter Financial Results. Good afternoon, everyone, and welcome to NantHealth's 2022 first quarter financial results conference call. Turning briefly to our financial performance, we reported positive momentum in Q1, with total revenue increasing to $16.4 million over the previous quarter total revenue of $16 million. For the first quarter 2022, total revenue was $16.4 million compared with $16.2 million in the prior year first quarter.
